name: PT Indonesia Untuk Dunia
description: Developer of a performance management platform designed to provide real-time people data. The company's platform allows managers to monitor and give reviews to rate the performance and continuous feedback related to a task, enabling employees to get visibility of all tasks' progress and their alignment with the company's strategic priority.
one_liner: Developer of a performance management platform designed to provide real-time people data. The company's platform allows managers to monitor and give reviews to rate the performance and continuous feedback related to a task, enabling employees to get visibility of all tasks' progress and their alignment with the company's strategic priority.
